I have a mac and use the Steam version of the game. I have a 2.9 GHz Intel i7 processor, and an Intel HD Graphics 4000 1024MB Graphics card, although I doubt that is the problem.

In career and Science mode, I go to the Technology tree, and there is no way for me to research a new topic. I have watched a few videos, and they show a button that my game does not, notably, a "research" button. Am I missing something? I guess I don't really know how to proceed advance on the tech tree. Thank you for your help!

What are your graphics (screen resolution) settings? Seems like the part where the button shows is cut off in your screen, and sure it has much lower resolution than mine (pic below, blue button is the one you are looking for):

Your Screen Resolution is too low. For some Reason on MAC OSX KSP defaults to the lowest screen size every time. This includes just going into the menu. That will fix your issue. set it to the highest it will allow if your playing on the laptop.
